Methods of finding confidence sets

Inverting tests​

Idea: 當我們做假設檢定 H0:θ=θ0H_0:\theta=\theta_0H0​:θ=θ0​ 時，如果我們沒有拒絕 H0H_0H0​，那麼我們可以說這組數據是“支持” θ=θ0\theta=\theta_0θ=θ0​ 的。因此，我們可以認為 θ0∈C(X~)\theta_0\in C(\utilde{X})θ0​∈C(X​)。那麼我們對所有 θ0\theta_0θ0​ 都作這樣的檢定，如果我們在資料 x~\utilde{x}x​ 下沒有拒絕這個 H0H_0H0​，我們就把這個 θ0\theta_0θ0​ 放進 C(x~)C(\utilde{x})C(x​)。這樣我們就得到了一個 confidence set。

EX X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iidU(0,θ)X_1, \cdots, X_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}U(0, \theta)X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidU(0,θ)

H0:θ=θ0vs.H1:θ≠θ0H_0:\theta=\theta_0\quad\text{vs.}\quad H_1:\theta\neq\theta_0H0​:θ=θ0​vs.H1​:θ=θ0​

  ⟹  \implies⟹ UMP level α\alphaα test is rejects H0H_0H0​ if x(n)>θ0x_{(n)}>\theta_0x(n)​>θ0​ or x(n)<θ0α1nx_{(n)}<\theta_0\alpha^\frac{1}{n}x(n)​<θ0​αn1​

  ⟺  \iff⟺ Note rejects H0H_0H0​ if x(n)≤θ0x_{(n)}\le\theta_0x(n)​≤θ0​ and x(n)≥θ0α1nx_{(n)}\ge\theta_0\alpha^\frac{1}{n}x(n)​≥θ0​αn1​

Note.

Pθ0(rej. H0)=α∀θ0>0  ⟺  Pθ0(Not rej. H0)=1−α∀θ0>0  ⟺  Pθ(X(n)≤θ≤X(n)α−1n)=1−α∀θ>0\begin{align*} &P_{\theta_0}(\text{rej. }H_0) = \alpha \quad \forall\theta_0 > 0\\ \iff& P_{\theta_0}(\text{Not rej. }H_0)=1-\alpha \quad \forall\theta_0 > 0\\ \iff& P_{\theta}(X_{(n)}\le\theta\le X_{(n)}\alpha^{-\frac{1}{n}})=1-\alpha \quad \forall\theta > 0 \end{align*}⟺⟺​Pθ0​​(rej. H0​)=α∀θ0​>0Pθ0​​(Not rej. H0​)=1−α∀θ0​>0Pθ​(X(n)​≤θ≤X(n)​α−n1​)=1−α∀θ>0​

  ⟹  [X(n),X(n)α−1n]\implies [X_{(n)}, X_{(n)}\alpha^{-\frac{1}{n}}]⟹[X(n)​,X(n)​α−n1​] is a 1−α1-\alpha1−α UMA confidence set for θ\thetaθ.

  • 我們可以從 UMP α\alphaα test 得到 UMA conf coef 1−α1-\alpha1−α 的 confidence set。
Definition

Inverting tests Method:

Let a non-randomized level α\alphaα test

ϕ(X~)={1if X~∈B(θ0)= rejection region0if X~∈(B(θ0))c≜A(θ0)= acceptance region\phi(\utilde{X}) = \begin{cases} 1 & \text{if } \utilde{X}\in B(\theta_0)=\text{ rejection region}\\ 0 & \text{if } \utilde{X}\in (B(\theta_0))^c\triangleq A(\theta_0)=\text{ acceptance region} \end{cases}ϕ(X​)={10​if X​∈B(θ0​)= rejection regionif X​∈(B(θ0​))c≜A(θ0​)= acceptance region​

Def C(X~)C(\utilde{X})C(X​) with X~∈A(θ0)  ⟺  θ0∈C(X~)\utilde{X}\in A(\theta_0)\iff\theta_0\in C(\utilde{X})X​∈A(θ0​)⟺θ0​∈C(X​), then

∀θ0Pθ0(θ0∈C(X~))=Pθ0(X~∈A(θ0))=1−Pθ0(X~∈B(θ0))=1−α\begin{align*} \forall\theta_0\quad P_{\theta_0}(\theta_0\in C(\utilde{X})) &= P_{\theta_0}(\utilde{X}\in A(\theta_0))\\ &=1-P_{\theta_0}(\utilde{X}\in B(\theta_0))\\ &=1-\alpha \end{align*}∀θ0​Pθ0​​(θ0​∈C(X​))​=Pθ0​​(X​∈A(θ0​))=1−Pθ0​​(X​∈B(θ0​))=1−α​

i.e. ∀θPθ(θ∈C(X~))=1−α  ⟹  C(X~)\forall\theta P_\theta(\theta\in C(\utilde{X}))=1-\alpha\implies C(\utilde{X})∀θPθ​(θ∈C(X​))=1−α⟹C(X​) is a 1−α1-\alpha1−α confidence set for θ\thetaθ.

In fact, θ0∈C(X~)  ⟺  X~∈A(θ0)\theta_0\in C(\utilde{X})\iff\utilde{X}\in A(\theta_0)θ0​∈C(X​)⟺X​∈A(θ0​)。因此我們可以通過檢定的結果來得到 confidence set，也可以通過 confidence set 來得到檢定的結果。

也就是說，there is Duality(一體兩面) relationship between confidence sets and hypothesis tests. 它們問的是同一個問題，只是從不同的角度來看。假設檢定是給定 θ\thetaθ，看數據是否支持這個 θ\thetaθ；而 confidence set 是給定數據，看這個數據支持哪些 θ\thetaθ。

因此我們可以利用已知結果的檢定來得到 confidence set，並且

  • UMP   ⟹  \implies⟹ UMA
  • UMPU   ⟹  \implies⟹ UMAU

EX X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iidU(0,θ)X_1,\cdots, X_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}U(0, \theta)X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidU(0,θ). Find UMAU 1−α1-\alpha1−α conf lower bound for θ\thetaθ (θ≥L(X~)\theta\ge L(\utilde{X})θ≥L(X​)).

  ⟹  \implies⟹ UMP level α\alphaα test for H0:θ≤θ0H_0:\theta\le\theta_0H0​:θ≤θ0​ vs. H1:θ>θ0H_1:\theta>\theta_0H1​:θ>θ0​ is rejects H0H_0H0​ if x(n)≤θ0x_{(n)}\le\theta_0x(n)​≤θ0​

i.e. Not reject H0H_0H0​ if x(n)≤θ0(1−α)1nx_{(n)}\le\theta_0(1-\alpha)^{\frac{1}{n}}x(n)​≤θ0​(1−α)n1​

i.e. { x~:x(n)(1−α)−1n≤θ0 }=A(θ0)\set{\utilde{x}:x_{(n)}(1-\alpha)^{-\frac{1}{n}}\le\theta_0}=A(\theta_0){x​:x(n)​(1−α)−n1​≤θ0​}=A(θ0​)

  ⟹  C(X~)={ θ0:X~∈A(θ0) }={ θ0:θ0≥Xn(1−α)−1n }=[X(n)(1−α)−1n,∞)\implies C(\utilde{X})=\set{\theta_0:\utilde{X}\in A(\theta_0)}=\set{\theta_0:\theta_0\ge X_{n}(1-\alpha)^{-\frac{1}{n}}}=[X_{(n)}(1-\alpha)^{-\frac{1}{n}}, \infty)⟹C(X​)={θ0​:X​∈A(θ0​)}={θ0​:θ0​≥Xn​(1−α)−n1​}=[X(n)​(1−α)−n1​,∞)

is UMA(hence UMAU) 1−α1-\alpha1−α confidence set for θ\thetaθ.

如果我們關注的是 upper bound，那麼我們同樣做鑒定，得到 reject H0H_0H0​ if x(n)<θ0α1nx_{(n)}<\theta_0\alpha^{\frac{1}{n}}x(n)​<θ0​αn1​。而他的接受區域是 { x~:x(n)≥θ0α1n }\set{\utilde{x}:x_{(n)}\ge\theta_0\alpha^{\frac{1}{n}}}{x​:x(n)​≥θ0​αn1​}。因此我們可以得到 UMAU 1−α1-\alpha1−α confidence set for θ\thetaθ is (−∞,X(n)α−1n](-\infty, X_{(n)}\alpha^{-\frac{1}{n}}](−∞,X(n)​α−n1​]。

EX

⊥<X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iidN(μ,σ2)Y1,⋯ ,Ym∼iidN(μ,σ2)\perp \Big< \begin{align*} &X_1, \cdots, X_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}N(\mu, \sigma^2)\\ &Y_1, \cdots, Y_m\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}N(\mu, \sigma^2) \end{align*}⊥⟨​X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidN(μ,σ2)Y1​,⋯,Ym​∼iidN(μ,σ2)​

C(X~,Y~)={ λ:λ≥L(X~,Y~) }C(\utilde{X}, \utilde{Y})=\set{\lambda:\lambda\ge L(\utilde{X}, \utilde{Y})}C(X​,Y​)={λ:λ≥L(X​,Y​)} with θ=(μx,μy,σx2,σy2)\theta=(\mu_x, \mu_y, \sigma^2_x, \sigma^2_y)θ=(μx​,μy​,σx2​,σy2​)

  ⟹  \implies⟹ UMAU lower bound 1−α1-\alpha1−α for λ=σx2σy2\lambda=\frac{\sigma^2_x}{\sigma^2_y}λ=σy2​σx2​​

  ⟹  \implies⟹ UMPU level α\alphaα for

H0:σx2σy2=λ=λ0vs.H1:σx2σy2=λ>λ0H_0:\frac{\sigma^2_x}{\sigma^2_y}=\lambda=\lambda_0\quad\text{vs.}\quad H_1:\frac{\sigma^2_x}{\sigma^2_y}=\lambda>\lambda_0H0​:σy2​σx2​​=λ=λ0​vs.H1​:σy2​σx2​​=λ>λ0​

rejects H0H_0H0​ if Sx2/σx2Sy2/σy2>Fn−1,m−1(α)  ⟺  Sx2SY2>λ0Fn−1,m−1(α)\frac{S^2_x/\sigma^2_x}{S^2_y/\sigma^2_y}>F_{n-1, m-1}(\alpha)\iff \frac{S^2_x}{S^2_Y}>\lambda_0F_{n-1, m-1}(\alpha)Sy2​/σy2​Sx2​/σx2​​>Fn−1,m−1​(α)⟺SY2​Sx2​​>λ0​Fn−1,m−1​(α) where λ0=H0σx2σy2\lambda_0\overset{H_0}{=}\frac{\sigma^2_x}{\sigma^2_y}λ0​=H0​σy2​σx2​​

i.e. Not reject H0H_0H0​ if Sx2Sy2≤λ0Fn−1,m−1(α)  ⟹  λ∈C(X~,Y~)={ λ:λ≤SX2SY2Fn−1,m−1,α−1 }\frac{S^2_x}{S^2_y}\le\lambda_0F_{n-1, m-1}(\alpha)\implies\lambda\in C(\utilde{X}, \utilde{Y})=\set{\lambda:\lambda\le\frac{S^2_X}{S^2_Y}F_{n-1,m-1,\alpha}^{-1}}Sy2​Sx2​​≤λ0​Fn−1,m−1​(α)⟹λ∈C(X​,Y​)={λ:λ≤SY2​SX2​​Fn−1,m−1,α−1​}

i.e. [SX2SY21Fn−1,m−1,α,∞)[\frac{S^2_X}{S^2_Y}\frac{1}{F_{n-1,m-1,\alpha}},\infty)[SY2​SX2​​Fn−1,m−1,α​1​,∞) is 1−α1-\alpha1−α UMAU lower bound for λ=σx2σy2\lambda=\frac{\sigma^2_x}{\sigma^2_y}λ=σy2​σx2​​.

Pivot​

Definition

A r.v. K(X~;θ)K(\utilde{X};\theta)K(X​;θ) is called a pivot   ⟺  K(X~;θ)\iff K(\utilde{X};\theta)⟺K(X​;θ) 's dist ⊥θ\perp\theta⊥θ

EX X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iidN(μ,σ2)X_1,\cdots, X_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}N(\mu, \sigma^2)X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidN(μ,σ2),

n(Xˉ−μ)σ∼N(0,1)⊥μ,σ2\frac{\sqrt{n}(\bar{X}-\mu)}{\sigma}\sim N(0, 1) \perp \mu, \sigma^2σn​(Xˉ−μ)​∼N(0,1)⊥μ,σ2

If K(X~,θ)K(\utilde{X},\theta)K(X​,θ) is a pivot, then ∀\forall∀ set BBB, P(K(X~,θ)∈B)⊥θP(K(\utilde{X},\theta)\in B)\perp\thetaP(K(X​,θ)∈B)⊥θ

  ⟹  \implies⟹ Given α∈(0,1),∃Bα\alpha\in(0, 1), \exist B_\alphaα∈(0,1),∃Bα​ s.t. P(K(X~,θ)∈Bα)=1−αP(K(\utilde{X},\theta)\in B_\alpha)=1-\alphaP(K(X​,θ)∈Bα​)=1−α. i.e. inf⁡θP(K∈Bα)=1−α\inf_\theta P(K\in B_\alpha)=1-\alphainfθ​P(K∈Bα​)=1−α

Definition
C(X~)={ θ:K(X~,θ)∈Bα }C(\utilde{X})=\set{\theta:K(\utilde{X},\theta)\in B_\alpha}C(X​)={θ:K(X​,θ)∈Bα​}

we have

∀θPθ(θ∈C(X~))=P(K(X~,θ)∈Bα)=1−α\forall\theta\quad P_\theta(\theta\in C(\utilde{X}))=P(K(\utilde{X},\theta)\in B_\alpha)=1-\alpha∀θPθ​(θ∈C(X​))=P(K(X​,θ)∈Bα​)=1−α

  ⟹  inf⁡θPθ(θ∈C(X~))=1−α\implies \inf_\theta P_\theta(\theta\in C(\utilde{X}))=1-\alpha⟹infθ​Pθ​(θ∈C(X​))=1−α, i.e. C(X~)C(\utilde{X})C(X​) is a 1−α1-\alpha1−α confidence set for θ\thetaθ.

EX X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iidN(μ,σ02)X_1,\cdots, X_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}N(\mu, \sigma^2_0)X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidN(μ,σ02​) with σ02\sigma^2_0σ02​ known. Given α∈(0,1)\alpha\in(0, 1)α∈(0,1), find 1−α1-\alpha1−α confidence set for μ\muμ.

  ⟹  n(Xˉ−μ)σ0∼N(0,1)⊥μ\implies \frac{\sqrt{n}(\bar{X}-\mu)}{\sigma_0}\sim N(0, 1)\perp\mu⟹σ0​n​(Xˉ−μ)​∼N(0,1)⊥μ

Let Bα=[−Zα1,Zα2]B_\alpha=[-Z_{\alpha_1}, Z_{\alpha_2}]Bα​=[−Zα1​​,Zα2​​] with α1+α2=α  ⟹  P(n(Xˉ−μ)σ0∈Bα)=1−α\alpha_1+\alpha_2=\alpha\implies P\left(\frac{\sqrt{n}(\bar{X}-\mu)}{\sigma_0}\in B_\alpha\right)=1-\alphaα1​+α2​=α⟹P(σ0​n​(Xˉ−μ)​∈Bα​)=1−α

C(X~)={ μ:−Zα1≤n(Xˉ−μ)σ0≤Zα2 }={ μ:Xˉ−σ0Zα1n≤μ≤Xˉ+σ0Zα2n }=[Xˉ−σ0Zα1n,Xˉ+σ0Zα2n]\begin{align*} C(\utilde{X})&=\set{\mu:-Z_{\alpha_1}\le\frac{\sqrt{n}(\bar{X}-\mu)}{\sigma_0}\le Z_{\alpha_2}}\\ &=\set{\mu:\bar{X}-\frac{\sigma_0Z_{\alpha_1}}{\sqrt{n}}\le\mu\le\bar{X}+\frac{\sigma_0Z_{\alpha_2}}{\sqrt{n}}}\\ &=\left[\bar{X}-\frac{\sigma_0Z_{\alpha_1}}{\sqrt{n}}, \bar{X}+\frac{\sigma_0Z_{\alpha_2}}{\sqrt{n}}\right] \end{align*}C(X​)​={μ:−Zα1​​≤σ0​n​(Xˉ−μ)​≤Zα2​​}={μ:Xˉ−n​σ0​Zα1​​​≤μ≤Xˉ+n​σ0​Zα2​​​}=[Xˉ−n​σ0​Zα1​​​,Xˉ+n​σ0​Zα2​​​]​

所有 α1+α2=α\alpha_1+\alpha_2=\alphaα1​+α2​=α 構建的 confidence set 都是 1−α1-\alpha1−α confidence set，但我們希望找到最好的 confidence set，也就是找到長度最短的 confidence set。

C(X~)C(\utilde{X})C(X​) 的長度 =σ0n(Zα2−Zα1)=\frac{\sigma_0}{\sqrt{n}}(Z_{\alpha_2}-Z_{\alpha_1})=n​σ0​​(Zα2​​−Zα1​​)。為了使它最短，並且保證 P(Zα1≤Z≤Zα2)=1−αP(Z_{\alpha_1}\le Z\le Z_{\alpha_2})=1-\alphaP(Zα1​​≤Z≤Zα2​​)=1−α

  ⟺  \iff⟺ min (Zα2−Zα1)(Z_{\alpha_2}-Z_{\alpha_1})(Zα2​​−Zα1​​) s.t. Φ(Zα2)−Φ(Zα1)=1−α\Phi(Z_{\alpha_2})-\Phi(Z_{\alpha_1})=1-\alphaΦ(Zα2​​)−Φ(Zα1​​)=1−α

我們可以使用 Largrange multiplier method 來求解這個問題。如果我們要使 h(a,b)h(a,b)h(a,b) 最小（或最大）並保證限製函數 g(a,b)=kg(a,b)=kg(a,b)=k，即找到 a,ba,ba,b 使得

∇h(a,b)=λ∇g(a,b)and g(a,b)=k\nabla h(a,b)=\lambda\nabla g(a,b)\quad \text{and } g(a,b)=k∇h(a,b)=λ∇g(a,b)and g(a,b)=k

這裡 h(a,b)=b−a,g(a,b)=Φ(b)−Φ(a),k=1−αh(a,b)=b-a, g(a,b)=\Phi(b)-\Phi(a), k=1-\alphah(a,b)=b−a,g(a,b)=Φ(b)−Φ(a),k=1−α

{∂∂a(b−a)=λ∂∂aΦ(a)∂∂b(b−a)=λ∂∂bΦ(b)Φ(b)−Φ(a)=1−α  ⟹  {−1=−λϕ(a)1=λϕ(b)Φ(b)−Φ(a)=1−α\begin{cases} \frac{\partial}{\partial a}(b-a)=\lambda\frac{\partial}{\partial a}\Phi(a)\\ \frac{\partial}{\partial b}(b-a)=\lambda\frac{\partial}{\partial b}\Phi(b)\\ \Phi(b)-\Phi(a)=1-\alpha \end{cases}\implies\begin{cases} -1=-\lambda\phi(a)\\ 1=\lambda\phi(b)\\ \Phi(b)-\Phi(a)=1-\alpha \end{cases}⎩⎨⎧​∂a∂​(b−a)=λ∂a∂​Φ(a)∂b∂​(b−a)=λ∂b∂​Φ(b)Φ(b)−Φ(a)=1−α​⟹⎩⎨⎧​−1=−λϕ(a)1=λϕ(b)Φ(b)−Φ(a)=1−α​   ⟹  ϕ(a)=ϕ(b) and Φ(b)−Φ(a)=1−α  ⟹  a=−b\implies \phi(a)=\phi(b) \text{ and } \Phi(b)-\Phi(a)=1-\alpha \implies a=-b ⟹ϕ(a)=ϕ(b) and Φ(b)−Φ(a)=1−α⟹a=−b

i.e. Zα1=Zα2,Zα2=Z1−α2  ⟹  Z_{\alpha_1}=Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}, Z_{\alpha_2}=Z_{1-\frac{\alpha}{2}}\impliesZα1​​=Z2α​​,Zα2​​=Z1−2α​​⟹ the best confidence set for μ\muμ is [Xˉ±σ0nZα2]\left[\bar{X}\pm \frac{\sigma_0}{\sqrt{n}}Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}\right][Xˉ±n​σ0​​Z2α​​] with length 2σ0nZα2\frac{2\sigma_0}{\sqrt{n}}Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}n​2σ0​​Z2α​​

同樣，我們也可以用 X1−μσ0\frac{X_1-\mu}{\sigma_0}σ0​X1​−μ​ 作為 pivot 來得到 confidence set [X1±σ0Zα2]\left[X_1\pm\sigma_0Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}\right][X1​±σ0​Z2α​​]，而長度為 2σ0Zα22\sigma_0Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}2σ0​Z2α​​。

比較兩個 confidence set 的長度，我們可以發現 Xˉ\bar{X}Xˉ 的 confidence set 的長度比 X1X_1X1​ 的 confidence set 的長度要短。因此我們會選擇基於 Xˉ\bar{X}Xˉ 的 confidence set。

Remark: 我們會使用基於 sufficient statistics 的 pivot 來構建 confidence set。

Note

  1. X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iidf(x;θ)=f(x−θ)X_1, \cdots, X_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}f(x;\theta)=f(x-\theta)X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidf(x;θ)=f(x−θ) called location family

    Let Yi=Xi−θ  ⟺  Xi=Yi+θY_i=X_i-\theta\iff X_i=Y_i+\thetaYi​=Xi​−θ⟺Xi​=Yi​+θ

      ⟹  fYi(y)=fXi(y+θ)⋅∣ddy(y+θ)∣=f(y+θ−θ)=f(y)⊥θ \implies f_{Y_i}(y)=f_{X_i}(y+\theta)\cdot |\frac{d}{dy}(y+\theta)|=f(y+\theta-\theta)=f(y) \perp \theta⟹fYi​​(y)=fXi​​(y+θ)⋅∣dyd​(y+θ)∣=f(y+θ−θ)=f(y)⊥θ

      ⟹  Y1,⋯ ,Yn∼iidf(y)\implies Y_1,\cdots,Y_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim} f(y)⟹Y1​,⋯,Yn​∼iidf(y) are pivots   ⟹  ∀h,h(Y1,⋯ ,Yn)\implies\forall h, h(Y_1,\cdots, Y_n)⟹∀h,h(Y1​,⋯,Yn​) are also pivots

  2. X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iidf(x;σ)=1σf(xσ)X_1, \cdots, X_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}f(x;\sigma)=\frac{1}{\sigma}f(\frac{x}{\sigma})X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidf(x;σ)=σ1​f(σx​) called scale family

    Let Yi=Xiσ  ⟺  Xi=YiσY_i=\frac{X_i}{\sigma}\iff X_i=Y_i\sigmaYi​=σXi​​⟺Xi​=Yi​σ

      ⟹  fYi(y)=fXi(yσ)⋅∣ddy(yσ)∣=1σf(yσσ)⋅σ=f(y)⊥σ\implies f_{Y_i}(y)=f_{X_i}(y\sigma)\cdot |\frac{d}{dy}(y\sigma)|=\frac{1}{\sigma}f(\frac{y\sigma}{\sigma})\cdot\sigma=f(y)\perp\sigma⟹fYi​​(y)=fXi​​(yσ)⋅∣dyd​(yσ)∣=σ1​f(σyσ​)⋅σ=f(y)⊥σ

      ⟹  Y1,⋯ ,Yn∼iidf(y)\implies Y_1,\cdots,Y_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}f(y)⟹Y1​,⋯,Yn​∼iidf(y) are pivots   ⟹  ∀h,h(Y1,⋯ ,Yn)\implies\forall h, h(Y_1,\cdots, Y_n)⟹∀h,h(Y1​,⋯,Yn​) are also pivots

  3. X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iidf(x;θ,σ)=1σf(x−θσ)X_1, \cdots, X_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}f(x;\theta, \sigma)=\frac{1}{\sigma}f(\frac{x-\theta}{\sigma})X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidf(x;θ,σ)=σ1​f(σx−θ​) called location-scale family

    Let Yi=Xi−θσ  ⟺  Xi=Yiσ+θY_i=\frac{X_i-\theta}{\sigma}\iff X_i=Y_i\sigma+\thetaYi​=σXi​−θ​⟺Xi​=Yi​σ+θ

上面找的都是 σ2\sigma^2σ2 的信賴區間，而對於 σ=σ2\sigma=\sqrt{\sigma^2}σ=σ2​

1−α=P(A≤σ2≤B)=P(A≤σ≤B)  ⟹  1−α=Pθ(θ∈C(X~))=Pθ(h(θ)∈h(C(X~)))\begin{align*} 1-\alpha&=P(A\le\sigma^2\le B)\\ &=P(\sqrt{A}\le\sigma\le\sqrt{B})\\ \end{align*}\implies \begin{align*} 1-\alpha&=P_\theta(\theta\in C(\utilde{X}))\\ &=P_\theta(h(\theta)\in h(C(\utilde{X})))\\ \end{align*}1−α​=P(A≤σ2≤B)=P(A​≤σ≤B​)​⟹1−α​=Pθ​(θ∈C(X​))=Pθ​(h(θ)∈h(C(X​)))​

EX X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iide−(x−θ)X_1,\cdots, X_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}e^{-(x-\theta)}X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iide−(x−θ) with x≥θx\ge\thetax≥θ is a location family   ⟹  X(1)\implies X_{(1)}⟹X(1)​ is suff for θ\thetaθ。因此我們用 X(1)−θX_{(1)}-\thetaX(1)​−θ 構建 pivot。

Y=2n(X(1)−θ)∼12e−y2,y>0=dGamma(1,2)=dχ22⊥θY=2n(X_{(1)}-\theta)\sim \frac{1}{2}e^{-\frac{y}{2}}, y>0\overset{d}{=}\text{Gamma}(1,2)\overset{d}{=}\chi^2_2\perp\thetaY=2n(X(1)​−θ)∼21​e−2y​,y>0=dGamma(1,2)=dχ22​⊥θ

with Ca,b(X(1))=[X(1)−b2n,X(1)−a2n]C_{a,b}(X_{(1)})=\left[X_{(1)}-\frac{b}{2n}, X_{(1)}-\frac{a}{2n}\right]Ca,b​(X(1)​)=[X(1)​−2nb​,X(1)​−2na​] are 1−α1-\alpha1−α conf. int. for θ\thetaθ.

為了找到最短的 confidence set，我們要找到最小的 b−ab-ab−a s.t. G(b)−G(a)=1−αG(b)-G(a)=1-\alphaG(b)−G(a)=1−α with GGG: cdf of χ22\chi^2_2χ22​。

{−1=λ(−g(a))1=λg(b)G(b)−G(a)=1−α  ⟹  g(a)=g(b)  ⟹  a=−b\begin{cases} -1=\lambda(-g(a))\\ 1=\lambda g(b)\\ G(b)-G(a)=1-\alpha \end{cases}\implies g(a)=g(b)\implies a=-b⎩⎨⎧​−1=λ(−g(a))1=λg(b)G(b)−G(a)=1−α​⟹g(a)=g(b)⟹a=−b

但注意到 g(y)=12e−y2g(y)=\frac{1}{2}e^{-\frac{y}{2}}g(y)=21​e−2y​ 是單調遞減的。我們不可能在一個絕對遞減的函數中，得到兩個函數值相同但自變量不同的點。因此最小值發身在邊界點上，即 a=0,b=χ2,α2a=0, b=\chi^2_{2,\alpha}a=0,b=χ2,α2​

∫0b12e−y2dy=1−α  ⟹  1−e−b2=1−α  ⟹  b=−2log⁡(1−α)\int_0^b \frac{1}{2}e^{-\frac{y}{2}}dy=1-\alpha\implies 1-e^{-\frac{b}{2}}=1-\alpha\implies b=-2\log(1-\alpha)∫0b​21​e−2y​dy=1−α⟹1−e−2b​=1−α⟹b=−2log(1−α)

i.e. [X(1)+2log⁡(1−α)2n,X(1)][X_{(1)}+\frac{2\log(1-\alpha)}{2n}, X_{(1)}][X(1)​+2n2log(1−α)​,X(1)​] is 1−α1-\alpha1−α conf. int. for θ\thetaθ. 並且對於假設檢定 H0:θ=θ0H_0:\theta=\theta_0H0​:θ=θ0​ vs. H1:θ≠θ0H_1:\theta\neq\theta_0H1​:θ=θ0​，我們會

reject H0  ⟺  θ0∉Ca,b(X(1))  ⟺  θ0<X(1)−a2n or θ0>X(1)−b2n\text{reject } H_0\iff\theta_0\notin C_{a,b}(X_{(1)})\iff \theta_0<X_{(1)}-\frac{a}{2n} \text{ or } \theta_0>X_{(1)}-\frac{b}{2n}reject H0​⟺θ0​∈/Ca,b​(X(1)​)⟺θ0​<X(1)​−2na​ or θ0​>X(1)​−2nb​

事實上這個檢定是 UMP，因此這個信賴區間是 UMA。

危險

信賴區間的長度最短並不代表是 UMA 或 UMAU 的。

要說明一個信賴區間是 UMA 或 UMAU 的，我們需要通過檢定的結果來說明。

EX X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iidU(0,θ)X_1, \cdots, X_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}U(0, \theta)X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidU(0,θ). i.e. f(x;θ)=1θ⋅I(0≤xθ≤1)f(x;\theta)=\frac{1}{\theta}\cdot I(0\le\frac{x}{\theta}\le 1)f(x;θ)=θ1​⋅I(0≤θx​≤1)

T=X(n)T=X_{(n)}T=X(n)​ is suff for θ  ⟹  \theta\impliesθ⟹ use W=X(n)θ∈[0,1]W=\frac{X_{(n)}}{\theta}\in[0,1]W=θX(n)​​∈[0,1] as pivot. Let 0≤a<b≤10\le a<b\le 10≤a<b≤1 s.t.

1−α=P(a≤W≤b)=Pθ(a≤X(n)θ≤b)=Pθ(aθ≤X(n)≤bθ)=(bθθ)n−(aθθ)n=bn−an=Pθ(X(n)b≤θ≤X(n)a)\begin{align*} 1-\alpha&=P(a\le W\le b)\\ &=P_\theta(a\le\frac{X_{(n)}}{\theta}\le b)\\ &=P_\theta(a\theta\le X_{(n)}\le b\theta)=\left(\frac{b\theta}{\theta}\right)^n-\left(\frac{a\theta}{\theta}\right)^n=b^n-a^n\\ &=P_\theta\left(\frac{X_{(n)}}{b}\le\theta\le\frac{X_{(n)}}{a}\right)\\ \end{align*}1−α​=P(a≤W≤b)=Pθ​(a≤θX(n)​​≤b)=Pθ​(aθ≤X(n)​≤bθ)=(θbθ​)n−(θaθ​)n=bn−an=Pθ​(bX(n)​​≤θ≤aX(n)​​)​

Let Ca,b(X(n))=[X(n)b,X(n)a]  ⟹  ∀0≤a<b≤1C_{a,b}(X_{(n)})=[\frac{X_{(n)}}{b}, \frac{X_{(n)}}{a}]\implies \forall 0\le a<b\le 1Ca,b​(X(n)​)=[bX(n)​​,aX(n)​​]⟹∀0≤a<b≤1 with bn−an=1−αb^n-a^n=1-\alphabn−an=1−α, Ca,b(X(n))C_{a,b}(X_{(n)})Ca,b​(X(n)​) are 1−α1-\alpha1−α conf. int. for θ\thetaθ.

接下來，為了得到最短的信賴區間，我們要最小化 1a−1b\frac{1}{a}-\frac{1}{b}a1​−b1​ s.t. bn−an=1−αb^n-a^n=1-\alphabn−an=1−α。而此時 Lagrange multiplier method 就不適用了。

∵bn−an=1−α  ⟹  a=a(b)\because b^n-a^n=1-\alpha\implies a = a(b)∵bn−an=1−α⟹a=a(b), let l(b)=1a(b)−1bl(b)=\frac{1}{a(b)}-\frac{1}{b}l(b)=a(b)1​−b1​

n⋅bn−1−n⋅an−1⋅a′(b)=0a′(b)=bn−1an−1  ⟹  l′(b)=−a′(b)a2+1b2=−1a2bn−1an−1+1b2=an+1−bn+1an+1b2<0\begin{align*} n\cdot b^{n-1}-n\cdot a^{n-1}\cdot a'(b)&=0\\ a'(b)&=\frac{b^{n-1}}{a^{n-1}}\\ \end{align*} \implies \begin{align*} l'(b)&=-\frac{a'(b)}{a^2}+\frac{1}{b^2}=-\frac{1}{a^2}\frac{b^{n-1}}{a^{n-1}}+\frac{1}{b^2}\\ &=\frac{a^{n+1}-b^{n+1}}{a^{n+1}b^2}<0 \end{align*}n⋅bn−1−n⋅an−1⋅a′(b)a′(b)​=0=an−1bn−1​​⟹l′(b)​=−a2a′(b)​+b21​=−a21​an−1bn−1​+b21​=an+1b2an+1−bn+1​<0​

  ⟹  l(b)↘\implies l(b) \searrow⟹l(b)↘ in b≤1  ⟹  l(b)b\le 1\implies l(b)b≤1⟹l(b) is min when b=1  ⟹  a=α1nb=1\implies a=\alpha^{\frac{1}{n}}b=1⟹a=αn1​. I.e, the shortest one is [X(n),X(n)α−1n][X_{(n)}, X_{(n)}\alpha^{-\frac{1}{n}}][X(n)​,X(n)​α−n1​].

For testing H0:θ=θ0H_0:\theta=\theta_0H0​:θ=θ0​ vs. H1:θ≠θ0H_1:\theta\neq\theta_0H1​:θ=θ0​

  ⟹  reject H0  ⟺  θ0∉[X(n),X(n)α−1n]  ⟺  θ0<X(n) or θ0>X(n)α−1n  ⟺  X(n)>θ0 or X(n)<θ0α1n is UMP level α test\begin{align*} \implies\text{reject }H_0 &\iff \theta_0\notin [X_{(n)}, X_{(n)}\alpha^{-\frac{1}{n}}]\\ &\iff \theta_0<X_{(n)}\text{ or }\theta_0>X_{(n)}\alpha^{-\frac{1}{n}}\\ &\iff X_{(n)} > \theta_0 \text{ or } X_{(n)} < \theta_0\alpha^{\frac{1}{n}}\\ &\text{ is UMP level }\alpha\text{ test} \end{align*}⟹reject H0​​⟺θ0​∈/[X(n)​,X(n)​α−n1​]⟺θ0​<X(n)​ or θ0​>X(n)​α−n1​⟺X(n)​>θ0​ or X(n)​<θ0​αn1​ is UMP level α test​

  ⟹  [X(n),X(n)α−1n]\implies [X_{(n)}, X_{(n)}\alpha^{-\frac{1}{n}}]⟹[X(n)​,X(n)​α−n1​] is UMA 1−α1-\alpha1−α confidence set for θ\thetaθ.

EX X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iid1λe−xλ∈X_1, \cdots, X_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}\frac{1}{\lambda}e^{-\frac{x}{\lambda}}\inX1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidλ1​e−λx​∈ scale family and ∑Xi\sum X_i∑Xi​ is suff for λ\lambdaλ

Note that

∑i=1nXi∼Gamma(n,λ)  ⟹  2∑Xiλ∼Gamma(n,2)=χ2n2⊥λ\sum_{i=1}^n X_i \sim \text{Gamma}(n, \lambda)\implies \frac{2\sum X_i}{\lambda}\sim\text{Gamma}(n, 2)=\chi^2_{2n}\perp\lambdai=1∑n​Xi​∼Gamma(n,λ)⟹λ2∑Xi​​∼Gamma(n,2)=χ2n2​⊥λ

  ⟹  \implies⟹ Use 2∑Xiλ∼χ2n2\frac{2\sum X_i}{\lambda}\sim \chi^2_{2n}λ2∑Xi​​∼χ2n2​ as pivot.

  ⟹  1−α=Pλ(χ2n,1−α22≤2∑Xiλ≤χ2n,α22)=Pλ(2∑Xiχ2n,α22≤λ≤2∑Xiχ2n,1−α22)\begin{align*} \implies 1-\alpha&=P_\lambda(\chi^2_{2n, 1-\frac{\alpha}{2}}\le\frac{2\sum X_i}{\lambda}\le\chi^2_{2n, \frac{\alpha}{2}})\\ &=P_\lambda\left(\frac{2\sum X_i}{\chi^2_{2n,\frac{\alpha}{2}}}\le\lambda\le\frac{2\sum X_i}{\chi^2_{2n, 1-\frac{\alpha}{2}}}\right)\\ \end{align*}⟹1−α​=Pλ​(χ2n,1−2α​2​≤λ2∑Xi​​≤χ2n,2α​2​)=Pλ​(χ2n,2α​2​2∑Xi​​≤λ≤χ2n,1−2α​2​2∑Xi​​)​

  ⟹  [2∑Xiχ2n,1−α22,2∑Xiχ2n,α22]\implies \left[\frac{2\sum X_i}{\chi^2_{2n, 1-\frac{\alpha}{2}}}, \frac{2\sum X_i}{\chi^2_{2n, \frac{\alpha}{2}}}\right]⟹[χ2n,1−2α​2​2∑Xi​​,χ2n,2α​2​2∑Xi​​] is 1−α1-\alpha1−α conf. int. for λ\lambdaλ.

EX

⊥<X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iid1λe−xλ,x>0Y1,⋯ ,Ym∼iid1θe−yθ,y>0  ⟹  ⊥<2∑Xiλ∼χ2n2⊥λ2∑Yiθ∼χ2m2⊥θ\perp\Big<\begin{align*} &X_1, \cdots, X_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}\frac{1}{\lambda}e^{-\frac{x}{\lambda}}, x>0\\ &Y_1, \cdots, Y_m\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}\frac{1}{\theta}e^{-\frac{y}{\theta}}, y>0 \end{align*} \quad\implies\quad \perp\Big<\begin{align*} &\frac{2\sum X_i}{\lambda}\sim\chi^2_{2n}\perp\lambda\\ &\frac{2\sum Y_i}{\theta}\sim\chi^2_{2m}\perp\theta \end{align*}⊥⟨​X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidλ1​e−λx​,x>0Y1​,⋯,Ym​∼iidθ1​e−θy​,y>0​⟹⊥⟨​λ2∑Xi​​∼χ2n2​⊥λθ2∑Yi​​∼χ2m2​⊥θ​ 2∑Xiλ(2n)/2∑Yiθ(2m)∼F2n,2m=Xˉλ/Yˉθ=XˉYˉθλ\begin{align*} &\frac{2\sum X_i}{\lambda(2n)}\Bigg/\frac{2\sum Y_i}{\theta(2m)}\sim F_{2n, 2m}\\ =&\frac{\bar{X}}{\lambda}\bigg/\frac{\bar{Y}}{\theta}=\frac{\bar{X}}{\bar{Y}}\frac{\theta}{\lambda} \end{align*}=​λ(2n)2∑Xi​​/θ(2m)2∑Yi​​∼F2n,2m​λXˉ​/θYˉ​=YˉXˉ​λθ​​ 1−α=P(F2n,2m,1−α2≤F2n,2m≤F2n,2m,α2)=Pθ,λ(F2n,2m,1−α2≤XˉYˉθλ≤F2n,2m,α2)=Pθ,λ(YˉXˉF2n,2m,1−α2≤λθ≤YˉXˉF2n,2m,α2)\begin{align*} 1-\alpha&=P(F_{2n,2m,1-\frac{\alpha}{2}}\le F_{2n,2m}\le F_{2n,2m,\frac{\alpha}{2}})\\ &=P_{\theta,\lambda}\left(F_{2n,2m,1-\frac{\alpha}{2}}\le\frac{\bar{X}}{\bar{Y}}\frac{\theta}{\lambda}\le F_{2n,2m,\frac{\alpha}{2}}\right)\\ &=P_{\theta,\lambda}\left(\frac{\bar{Y}}{\bar{X}}F_{2n,2m,1-\frac{\alpha}{2}}\le\frac{\lambda}{\theta}\le\frac{\bar{Y}}{\bar{X}}F_{2n,2m,\frac{\alpha}{2}}\right)\\ \end{align*}1−α​=P(F2n,2m,1−2α​​≤F2n,2m​≤F2n,2m,2α​​)=Pθ,λ​(F2n,2m,1−2α​​≤YˉXˉ​λθ​≤F2n,2m,2α​​)=Pθ,λ​(XˉYˉ​F2n,2m,1−2α​​≤θλ​≤XˉYˉ​F2n,2m,2α​​)​

  ⟹  [YˉXˉF2n,2m,1−α2,YˉXˉF2n,2m,α2]\implies \left[\frac{\bar{Y}}{\bar{X}}F_{2n,2m,1-\frac{\alpha}{2}}, \frac{\bar{Y}}{\bar{X}}F_{2n,2m,\frac{\alpha}{2}}\right]⟹[XˉYˉ​F2n,2m,1−2α​​,XˉYˉ​F2n,2m,2α​​] is 1−α1-\alpha1−α conf. int. for λθ\frac{\lambda}{\theta}θλ​.

  ⟹  \implies⟹ To test H0:λ=θH_0:\lambda=\thetaH0​:λ=θ v.s. H1:λ≠θH_1:\lambda\neq\thetaH1​:λ=θ   ⟺  \iff⟺ H0:λθ=1H_0:\frac{\lambda}{\theta}=1H0​:θλ​=1 v.s. H1:λθ≠1H_1:\frac{\lambda}{\theta}\neq 1H1​:θλ​=1

Reject H0H_0H0​ if 1∉[YˉXˉF2n,2m,1−α2,YˉXˉF2n,2m,α2]1\notin\left[\frac{\bar{Y}}{\bar{X}}F_{2n,2m,1-\frac{\alpha}{2}}, \frac{\bar{Y}}{\bar{X}}F_{2n,2m,\frac{\alpha}{2}}\right]1∈/[XˉYˉ​F2n,2m,1−2α​​,XˉYˉ​F2n,2m,2α​​]

EX

<X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iidN(μx,σ2)Y1,⋯ ,Ym∼iidN(μy,σ2)\Big < \begin{align*} &X_1, \cdots, X_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}N(\mu_x, \sigma^2)\\ &Y_1, \cdots, Y_m\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}N(\mu_y, \sigma^2) \end{align*}⟨​X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidN(μx​,σ2)Y1​,⋯,Ym​∼iidN(μy​,σ2)​

Note that Sp2≜(n−1)SX2+(m−1)SY2n+m−2S_p^2\triangleq\frac{(n-1)S^2_X+(m-1)S^2_Y}{n+m-2}Sp2​≜n+m−2(n−1)SX2​+(m−1)SY2​​ is the best est for σ2\sigma^2σ2 and

Xˉ−Yˉ−(μx−μy)(1n+1m)Sp2∼tn+m−2⊥(μ,σ2)\frac{\bar{X}-\bar{Y}-(\mu_x-\mu_y)}{\sqrt{(\frac{1}{n}+\frac{1}{m})S_p^2}}\sim t_{n+m-2}\perp(\mu, \sigma^2)(n1​+m1​)Sp2​​Xˉ−Yˉ−(μx​−μy​)​∼tn+m−2​⊥(μ,σ2)

  ⟹  [(Xˉ−Yˉ)±tn+m−2,α2(1n+1m)Sp2]\implies [(\bar{X}-\bar{Y})\pm t_{n+m-2,\frac{\alpha}{2}}\sqrt{(\frac{1}{n}+\frac{1}{m})S_p^2}]⟹[(Xˉ−Yˉ)±tn+m−2,2α​​(n1​+m1​)Sp2​​] is 1−α1-\alpha1−α conf. int. for μx−μy\mu_x-\mu_yμx​−μy​.

To test H0:μx=μyH_0:\mu_x=\mu_yH0​:μx​=μy​ vs. H1:μx≠μyH_1:\mu_x\neq\mu_yH1​:μx​=μy​, reject H0H_0H0​ if 0∉[(Xˉ−Yˉ)±tn+m−2,α2(1n+1m)Sp2]0\notin\left[(\bar{X}-\bar{Y})\pm t_{n+m-2,\frac{\alpha}{2}}\sqrt{(\frac{1}{n}+\frac{1}{m})S_p^2}\right]0∈/[(Xˉ−Yˉ)±tn+m−2,2α​​(n1​+m1​)Sp2​​] is UMAP test.

  ⟹  [(Xˉ−Yˉ)±tn+m−2,α2(1n+1m)Sp2]\implies \left[(\bar{X}-\bar{Y})\pm t_{n+m-2,\frac{\alpha}{2}}\sqrt{(\frac{1}{n}+\frac{1}{m})S_p^2}\right]⟹[(Xˉ−Yˉ)±tn+m−2,2α​​(n1​+m1​)Sp2​​] is UMAU 1−α1-\alpha1−α conf. int. for μx−μy\mu_x-\mu_yμx​−μy​.

Asymptotic​

這個方法會讓 n→∞n\to\inftyn→∞，因此也稱為 Large Sample method。

As n→∞n\to\inftyn→∞, if W(x~)−θV(X~)→DN(0,1)\frac{W(\utilde{x})-\theta}{V(\utilde{X})}\xrightarrow{D}N(0,1)V(X​)W(x​)−θ​D​N(0,1), i.e.

P(a≤W(X~)−θV(X~)≤b)≈P(a≤Z≤b)P\left(a\le\frac{W(\utilde{X})-\theta}{V(\utilde{X})}\le b\right)\approx P\left(a\le Z\le b\right)P(a≤V(X​)W(X​)−θ​≤b)≈P(a≤Z≤b) i.e. 1−α≈Pθ(−Zα2≤W(X~)−θV(X~)≤Zα2)=Pθ(W(X~)−Zα2V(X~)≤θ≤W(X~)+Zα2V(X~))=Pθ(θ∈[W(X~)±Zα2V(X~)])∀θ\begin{align*} \text{i.e. }1-\alpha&\approx P_\theta\left(-Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}\le\frac{W(\utilde{X})-\theta}{V(\utilde{X})}\le Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}\right)\\ &=P_\theta\left(W(\utilde{X})-Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}V(\utilde{X})\le\theta\le W(\utilde{X})+Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}V(\utilde{X})\right)\\ &=P_\theta\left(\theta\in [W(\utilde{X})\pm Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}V(\utilde{X})]\right)\quad \forall\theta \end{align*}i.e. 1−α​≈Pθ​(−Z2α​​≤V(X​)W(X​)−θ​≤Z2α​​)=Pθ​(W(X​)−Z2α​​V(X​)≤θ≤W(X​)+Z2α​​V(X​))=Pθ​(θ∈[W(X​)±Z2α​​V(X​)])∀θ​

  ⟹  [W(X~)±Zα2V(X~)]\implies [W(\utilde{X})\pm Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}V(\utilde{X})]⟹[W(X​)±Z2α​​V(X​)] is approximated 1−α1-\alpha1−α conf. int. for θ\thetaθ.

Remark: 當有確定的樣本數時，永遠都是推導精確的信賴區間。只有當被要求時，才用 approximated 的信賴區間。

Theorem

C.L.T(中央極限定理)

X1,⋯ ,XnX_1,\cdots,X_nX1​,⋯,Xn​ are iid with E(Xi)=μ,Var(Xi)∈(0,∞)E(X_i)=\mu, Var(X_i)\in(0, \infty)E(Xi​)=μ,Var(Xi​)∈(0,∞), let Xˉ=1n∑i=1nXi\bar{X}=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^n X_iXˉ=n1​∑i=1n​Xi​, then

n(Xˉ−μ)σ→n→∞DN(0,1)\frac{\sqrt{n}(\bar{X}-\mu)}{\sigma}\xrightarrow[n\to\infty]{D}N(0,1)σn​(Xˉ−μ)​Dn→∞​N(0,1)i.e. P(n(Xˉ−μ)σ≤t)≈Φ(t)∀t for large enough n\text{i.e. }P\left(\frac{\sqrt{n}(\bar{X}-\mu)}{\sigma}\le t\right)\approx\Phi(t) \quad \forall t\text{ for large enough } ni.e. P(σn​(Xˉ−μ)​≤t)≈Φ(t)∀t for large enough n
  ⟹   if σ2 known  ⟹  P(−Zα2≤n(Xˉ−μ)σ≤Zα2)≈1−α  ⟺  Pμ(μ∈[Xˉ−σnZα2,Xˉ+σnZα2])≈1−α∀μ\begin{align*} &\implies \text{ if }\sigma^2\text{ known}\\ &\implies P\left(-Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}\le\frac{\sqrt{n}(\bar{X}-\mu)}{\sigma}\le Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}\right)\approx 1-\alpha\\ &\iff P_\mu\left(\mu\in[\bar{X}-\frac{\sigma}{\sqrt{n}}Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}, \bar{X}+\frac{\sigma}{\sqrt{n}}Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}]\right)\approx 1-\alpha\quad\forall\mu \end{align*}​⟹ if σ2 known⟹P(−Z2α​​≤σn​(Xˉ−μ)​≤Z2α​​)≈1−α⟺Pμ​(μ∈[Xˉ−n​σ​Z2α​​,Xˉ+n​σ​Z2α​​])≈1−α∀μ​

i.e. [Xˉ±σnZα2][\bar{X}\pm\frac{\sigma}{\sqrt{n}}Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}][Xˉ±n​σ​Z2α​​] is approximated 1−α1-\alpha1−α conf. int. for μ\muμ

Also Pμ(n(Xˉ−μ)σ≤Zα)=Pμ(μ≥Xˉ−σnZα)≈P(Z≤Zα)=1−α∀μ\begin{align*} \text{Also } &P_\mu\left(\frac{\sqrt{n}(\bar{X}-\mu)}{\sigma}\le Z_{\alpha}\right)=P_\mu\left(\mu\ge\bar{X}-\frac{\sigma}{\sqrt{n}}Z_{\alpha}\right)\\ \approx& P(Z\le Z_{\alpha})=1-\alpha\quad\forall\mu \end{align*}Also ≈​Pμ​(σn​(Xˉ−μ)​≤Zα​)=Pμ​(μ≥Xˉ−n​σ​Zα​)P(Z≤Zα​)=1−α∀μ​

i.e. [Xˉ−σnZα,∞)[\bar{X}-\frac{\sigma}{\sqrt{n}}Z_{\alpha}, \infty)[Xˉ−n​σ​Zα​,∞) is approximated 1−α1-\alpha1−α conf lower bound for μ\muμ.

但以上結論都是在 σ2\sigma^2σ2 已知的情況下。如果 σ2\sigma^2σ2 未知，上面的結論就是錯的。

Theorem

Slutsky's Theorem

  1. r.v.'s Yn→n→∞DWY_n\xrightarrow[n\to\infty]{D}WYn​Dn→∞​W : r.v., i.e. P(Yn≤t)→n→∞P(W≤t)P(Y_n\le t)\xrightarrow[n\to\infty]{}P(W\le t)P(Yn​≤t)n→∞​P(W≤t) ∀t\forall t∀t with FwF_wFw​: conti at ttt.
  2. r.v. Tn→n→∞PcT_n\xrightarrow[n\to\infty]{P}cTn​Pn→∞​c : const
  ⟹  TnYn→n→∞DcW\implies T_nY_n\xrightarrow[n\to\infty]{D}cW⟹Tn​Yn​Dn→∞​cW

EX X1,⋯ ,XnX_1,\cdots, X_nX1​,⋯,Xn​ are iid with E(Xi)=μ,Var(Xi)=σ2∈(0,∞)E(X_i)=\mu, Var(X_i)=\sigma^2\in(0, \infty)E(Xi​)=μ,Var(Xi​)=σ2∈(0,∞)

If σ2\sigma^2σ2 unknown

n(Xˉ−μ)S=n(Xˉ−μ)σ→DN(0,1)Sσ→P1→DN(0,1)\frac{\sqrt{n}(\bar{X}-\mu)}{S}=\frac{\frac{\sqrt{n}(\bar{X}-\mu)}{\sigma}\xrightarrow{D}N(0,1)}{\frac{S}{\sigma}\xrightarrow{P}1} \xrightarrow{D}N(0,1)Sn​(Xˉ−μ)​=σS​P​1σn​(Xˉ−μ)​D​N(0,1)​D​N(0,1)

i.e. If σ2\sigma^2σ2 unknown

  • [Xˉ±SnZα2][\bar{X}\pm\frac{S}{\sqrt{n}}Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}][Xˉ±n​S​Z2α​​] is approximated 1−α1-\alpha1−α conf. int. for μ\muμ
  • [Xˉ−SnZα,∞)[\bar{X}-\frac{S}{\sqrt{n}}Z_{\alpha}, \infty)[Xˉ−n​S​Zα​,∞) is approximated 1−α1-\alpha1−α conf lower bound for μ\muμ

EX X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iidB(1,p)X_1, \cdots, X_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}B(1, p)X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidB(1,p) with E(Xi)=p,Var(Xi)=p(1−p)E(X_i)=p, Var(X_i)=p(1-p)E(Xi​)=p,Var(Xi​)=p(1−p)

By C.L.Tn(Xˉ−p)p(1−p)→DN(0,1)\text{By C.L.T}\qquad\frac{\sqrt{n}(\bar{X}-p)}{\sqrt{p(1-p)}}\xrightarrow{D}N(0,1)By C.L.Tp(1−p)​n​(Xˉ−p)​D​N(0,1)

但其中分母部分有 ppp，這難以湊成 [L(X~),U(X~)][L(\utilde{X}),U(\utilde{X})][L(X​),U(X​)]。

L.L.N Xˉ→Pp  ⟹  Xˉ→Pp  ⟹  Xˉ(1−Xˉ)→Pp(1−p)\text{L.L.N }\bar{X}\xrightarrow{P}p\implies\bar{X}\xrightarrow{P}p\implies\sqrt{\bar{X}(1-\bar{X})}\xrightarrow{P}\sqrt{p(1-p)}L.L.N XˉP​p⟹XˉP​p⟹Xˉ(1−Xˉ)​P​p(1−p)​

  ⟹  [Xˉ±Zα2Xˉ(1−Xˉ)/n]\implies \left[\bar{X}\pm Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}\sqrt{\bar{X}(1-\bar{X})}/\sqrt{n}\right]⟹[Xˉ±Z2α​​Xˉ(1−Xˉ)​/n​] is approximated 1−α1-\alpha1−α conf. int. for ppp.

Recall: ∀an→1,bn→0\forall a_n\to 1, b_n\to 0∀an​→1,bn​→0, anXˉ+bn→Ppa_n\bar{X}+b_n\xrightarrow{P}pan​Xˉ+bn​P​p , i.e. 答案並不唯一。

S2=1n−1∑i=1n(Xi−Xˉ)2=1n−1∑i=1nXi2−nn−1Xˉ2=1n−1∑i=1nXi−nn−1Xˉ2Xi∈{0,1} in Bernoulli=nn−1Xˉ−nn−1Xˉ2=nn−1Xˉ(1−Xˉ)\begin{align*} S^2&=\frac{1}{n-1}\sum_{i=1}^n(X_i-\bar{X})^2\\ &=\frac{1}{n-1}\sum_{i=1}^nX_i^2-\frac{n}{n-1}\bar{X}^2\\ &=\frac{1}{n-1}\sum_{i=1}^nX_i-\frac{n}{n-1}\bar{X}^2\quad X_i\in\{0,1\}\text{ in Bernoulli}\\ &=\frac{n}{n-1}\bar{X}-\frac{n}{n-1}\bar{X}^2\\ &=\frac{n}{n-1}\bar{X}(1-\bar{X})\\ \end{align*}S2​=n−11​i=1∑n​(Xi​−Xˉ)2=n−11​i=1∑n​Xi2​−n−1n​Xˉ2=n−11​i=1∑n​Xi​−n−1n​Xˉ2Xi​∈{0,1} in Bernoulli=n−1n​Xˉ−n−1n​Xˉ2=n−1n​Xˉ(1−Xˉ)​

  ⟹  [Xˉ±Xˉ(1−Xˉ)n−1Zα2]\implies\left[\bar{X}\pm \frac{\sqrt{\bar{X}(1-\bar{X})}}{\sqrt{n-1}}Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}\right]⟹[Xˉ±n−1​Xˉ(1−Xˉ)​​Z2α​​] is also approximated 1−α1-\alpha1−α conf. int. for ppp.

Remark: 如果 Xˉ=1\bar{X}=1Xˉ=1 or 000 時，按照以上方法計算出的信賴區間會只有單點。在實際應用中，可能會偏離正確的信賴區間。

EX X1,⋯ ,Xn∼iidP(λ)X_1, \cdots, X_n\overset{\text{iid}}{\sim}P(\lambda)X1​,⋯,Xn​∼iidP(λ) with E(Xi)=λ=Var(Xi)E(X_i)=\lambda=Var(X_i)E(Xi​)=λ=Var(Xi​). 我們可以用 Xˉ\bar{X}Xˉ 或 S2S^2S2 來估計 λ\lambdaλ。

  ⟹  [Xˉ±Zα2Xˉ or S2n]\implies \left[\bar{X}\pm Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}\sqrt{\frac{\bar{X}\text{ or }S^2}{n}}\right]⟹[Xˉ±Z2α​​nXˉ or S2​​] are approximated 1−α1-\alpha1−α conf. int. for λ\lambdaλ.

我們還可以直接假設區間 C(X~)={ λ:−Zα2≤n(Xˉ−λ)λ≤Zα2 }C(\utilde{X})=\set{\lambda: -Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}\le\frac{\sqrt{n}(\bar{X}-\lambda)}{\sqrt{\lambda}}\le Z_{\frac{\alpha}{2}}}C(X​)={λ:−Z2α​​≤λ​n​(Xˉ−λ)​≤Z2α​​}，然後分別解出左右兩個不等式。這個區間相比於上面的區間更精確，因為少了一個 λ\lambdaλ 的估計。
